column4: do some reading on the autorun feature in general (for any OS, like Windows, Linux, etc) -- i don't think Linux distros typically support unauthorized autorun, but i usually disable it in any system i use anyway, unless explicitly needed
in other words, it's unlikely you would have an auto-run executable that's linux-format compatible, although it's possible
clamAV is sort of designed for what you want, though -- it looks for "parasites"
